summary: VEHICLE EXPERIENCED PROBLEMS WITH BASIC MOVEMENTS OF THE MOTORCYCLE WHEN TURNING. THE GROUNDING POINT OF THE TIRE MOVED. THE CENTRAL LINE OF THE MOTORCYCLE LEANED MORE, COMPARED WITH THE LINE WHICH CONNECTS WITH THE GROUNDING POINT AND THE CENTER OF MACHINE TILTS (YAMAHA FZR400 1996).    *MR   *TS   *NLM.  *AK
